sentences.en: A very large proportion of the world's sedimentary cover is composed of ancient deltaic deposits.
sentences.cn: 世界上的沉积盖层有很大一部分是由古代三角州沉积所组成的.

sentences.en: Aim To analyze Tertiary period sedimentary environment of Qaidamu saline lake.
sentences.cn: 目的分析柴达木盆地第三纪盐湖的沉积环境.

sentences.en: Bedding is the most important structural feature of sedimentary rock.
sentences.cn: 层理是沉积岩最主要的构造特征.

sentences.en: Eskers are very long ridges apparently formed when sub - glacial streams or rivers deposited sedimentary materials.
sentences.cn: 蛇形丘显然是冰下河溪的沉积物堆积而成的很长的垄岗.

sentences.en: In many sedimentary basins the salinity of the formation water increases with depth or compaction.
sentences.cn: 在许多沉积盆地中,地层水的含盐量随深度或压实作用而增高.

sentences.en: It is useful in discussing the nature of sedimentary deposits.
sentences.cn: 它在讨论沉积物的性质时是有用的.

sentences.en: Loose sediments may be changed into solid sedimentary rocks.
sentences.cn: 松散的沉积物可以变成坚硬的沉积岩.

sentences.en: Sedimentary loading with consequent thermal blanketing will become major factors.
sentences.cn: 随着热熄灭作用以后,沉积载荷将变成主要因素.

sentences.en: Sedimentary rocks are thus tagged by the fossils which they contain.
sentences.cn: 沉积岩就这样以它们所含的化石作为鉴别的标记.

sentences.en: Stocks , dykes etc. can be placed in simple sequence with the sedimentary rocks.
sentences.cn: 岩株, 岩墙等可以按其与沉积岩的简单顺序放在图中.

sentences.en: Subsurface temperature increases with burial depth might cause fluid expansion in most sedimentary basins.
sentences.cn: 在大多数沉积盆地中,地下温度随埋藏深度增高可能引起流体的膨胀.

sentences.en: The complex of sand bodies developed in a cyclical sequence of off - lapping sedimentary beds.
sentences.cn: 砂岩复合体发育于退覆沉积层的旋回层内.

sentences.en: The equation appears to be valid for a wider range of sedimentary rocks.
sentences.cn: 这个方程式看来适合于相当大的一部分沉积岩.

sentences.en: The sedimentary members are largely turbidites of greywacke facies.
sentences.cn: 沉积岩的组成大部分为杂砂岩相的浊积岩.

sentences.en: Uranium has been redistributed by biological processes as well as in the sedimentary cycle.
sentences.cn: 由于生物作用,以及沉积旋回,铀发生重新分布.

words.tran_cn: [矿业][物化] 沉降，[化学] 沉淀

trans.tran_en: made of the solid substances that settle at the bottom of the sea, rivers, lakes etc
